mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, class_id, quantity) VALUES (#{userId}, #{classId}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, u.name AS userName, c.class_id AS classId, c.quantity AS quantity, cl.class_title AS classTitle, cl.class_price AS cartPrice FROM cart c JOIN class cl ON c.class_id = cl.class_id JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND class_id = #{classId};
